mcq.statement: Choose an option that is correct according to the standard use of English:  A noise woke me up in the middle of the night.

options.a: A noise woke me up in the middle of the night.
options.b: A noise woke me up at the middle of the night
options.c: Noise woke me up in the middle of the night.
options.d: A noise woke me up on the middle of the night.
